refsect1.title: Properties
refsect1.synopsis: "cmyk-profile" GimpConfigPath : Read / Write / Construct "display-module" gchararray : Read / Write / Construct "display-profile" GimpConfigPath : Read / Write / Construct "display-profile-from-gdk" gboolean : Read / Write / Construct "display-rendering-intent" GimpColorRenderingIntent : Read / Write / Construct "mode" GimpColorManagementMode : Read / Write / Construct "out-of-gamut-color" GimpRGB : Read / Write / Construct "printer-profile" GimpConfigPath : Read / Write / Construct "rgb-profile" GimpConfigPath : Read / Write / Construct "simulation-gamut-check" gboolean : Read / Write / Construct "simulation-rendering-intent" GimpColorRenderingIntent : Read / Write / Construct

refsect2.title: GimpColorConfig
enum GimpColorManagementMode
enum GimpColorRenderingIntent
The "cmyk-profile" property
refsect2.para: The CMYK color profile used to convert between RGB and CMYK.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "display-module" property
refsect2.para: Default value: "CdisplayLcms"

refsect2.title: The "display-profile" property
refsect2.para: The color profile of your (primary) monitor.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "display-profile-from-gdk" property
refsect2.para: When enabled, GIMP will try to use the display color profile from the windowing system. The configured monitor profile is then only used as a fallback.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "display-rendering-intent" property
refsect2.para: Sets how colors are mapped for your display.
Default value: GIMP_COLOR_RENDERING_INTENT_PERCEPTUAL

refsect2.title: The "mode" property
refsect2.para: Mode of operation for color management.
Default value: GIMP_COLOR_MANAGEMENT_DISPLAY

refsect2.title: The "out-of-gamut-color" property
refsect2.para: The color to use for marking colors which are out of gamut.

refsect2.title: The "printer-profile" property
refsect2.para: The color profile used for simulating a printed version (softproof).
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "rgb-profile" property
refsect2.para: The default RGB working space color profile.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "simulation-gamut-check" property
refsect2.para: When enabled, the print simulation will mark colors which can not be represented in the target color space.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "simulation-rendering-intent" property
refsect2.para: Sets how colors are converted from RGB working space to the print simulation device.
Default value: GIMP_COLOR_RENDERING_INTENT_PERCEPTUAL
